docs.lead_paragraph: A doctor writes, “Abortion need not be justified to anyone at any time.”
docs.snippet: A doctor writes, “Abortion need not be justified to anyone at any time.”

docs.lead_paragraph: The Roman Catholic Church’s offer of absolution to women who have terminated a pregnancy is in line with modern anti-abortion strategy.

headline.main: The Pope’s Unforgiving Message of Forgiveness on Abortion

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by Jill Filipovic asserts Pope Francis's offer to forgive women who have had abortions is victory for anti-abortion movement rather than for women's rights; says portrayal of women as victims is effective public relations move that depicts church as protective rather than restrictive; holds offer still denies women control over their decisions.
docs.snippet: The Roman Catholic Church’s offer of absolution to women who have terminated a pregnancy is in line with modern anti-abortion strategy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Missouri's governor and top law enforcer are asking a federal judge to throw out a lawsuit by a group of Satanic worshippers who allege the state's abortion restrictions violate their religious beliefs and should be scrapped.

headline.main: Missouri Asks Judge to Toss Satanic Group's Abortion Suit
headline.print_headline: Missouri Asks Judge to Toss Satanic Group's Abortion Suit

docs.snippet: Missouri's governor and top law enforcer are asking a federal judge to throw out a lawsuit by a group of Satanic worshippers who allege the state's abortion restrictions violate their religious beliefs and should be scrapped.

headline.main: Down Syndrome and Abortion: Readers Share Their Stories

docs.abstract: Readers offered their experiences of abortion decisions and living with family members with Down syndrome in response to a recent op-ed.
docs.snippet: Readers offered their experiences of abortion decisions and living with family members with Down syndrome in response to a recent op-ed.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Long Island woman urged New York's highest court to dismiss her manslaughter conviction in the death of her baby, who was delivered alive after a car crash but died days later.

headline.main: Mom Wants Conviction Tossed in Death of Baby Born Post-Crash
headline.print_headline: Mom Wants Conviction Tossed in Death of Baby Born Post-Crash

docs.snippet: A Long Island woman urged New York's highest court to dismiss her manslaughter conviction in the death of her baby, who was delivered alive after a car crash but died days later.

docs.lead_paragraph: Odds have improved that many extremely premature U.S. infants will survive without major problems, although prospects remain poor for the smallest and youngest, born nearly four months too soon, a government-funded study found.

headline.main: Extreme Preemies Make Survival Gains, 20-Year Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Extreme Preemies Make Survival Gains, 20-Year Study Finds

docs.snippet: Odds have improved that many extremely premature U.S. infants will survive without major problems, although prospects remain poor for the smallest and youngest, born nearly four months too soon, a government-funded study found.

docs.abstract: Can companies excel without making workers miserable?
docs.snippet: Can companies excel without making workers miserable?
